titleStmt.title: At the Court at Whitehall the third of October, 1676. Whereas His Majesty and this board are informed of the bold and open repair made to several places, ... for the hearing of mass, and other worship and services of the Romish Church ...
titleStmt.author: England. Curia Regis.
Walker, Edward, Sir, 1612-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
List of those present follows title.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
